Articles.Content:
Hi folks. I got this mission to put a probe in keostationary orbit, so I created a probe after taking the contract, put it in space, and then I realised I forgot the thermometer. Fortunately I have KAS, so I sent Bob up to rendezvous and bring one. Attached it, took my repairs team back to the ground, and finally, I put the satellite in the correct orbit. As you can see in the screenshot, it ticks off all the requirements, except for the first one that says it needs to be a new unmanned probe that has an antenna and can generate power. Well, ok, sure, it was originally missing the thermometer, but it definitely was a new unmanned probe that I launched after accepting the contract, and it has an antenna and it can generate power, so that requirement should have been fulfilled, right? I tried changing the name and vessel type as this had helped me in the past with similar problems, but it didn't work. Any ideas?

Spoiler

Hi, @ninjawafflesofdoom!

We can't see that picture, just a bunch of text. If you upload it to a free photo site (Imgur is popular here) and then link it or paste it here we can see it.
